translations: 解决；决定；（立法机构等）表决；分解；使（病症）消退；使（不协和音）转向协和音；（当远处物体看得更清楚时）变成；（光学仪器等）分辨（resolve 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He resolved not to tell her the truth.
I resolved not to waste money on a hotel.
sentences.translation: 我决定不因住旅馆浪费钱。

sentences.sentence: We had resolved on making an early start.
sentences.translation: 我们已经决定早点动身。
